title: Projects
text: Here you can have a look on some of my Projects, please klick on the button to test them out!

loco.title: El Pollo Loco
loco.text: Jump and Run with throw Functions based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to get Coins, Marinade Chickens and fight aginst the Crazy Chicken.

bubble.title: DA Bubble
bubble.text: This App is a Slack Clone. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, realtime messaging, and robust channel organization.

join.title: Join
join.text: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
